other_tests.findings: Elevated serum IgG4 levels (2.50 g/L; normal levels <1.35 g/L).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normalization of serum IgG4 levels during rituximab therapy.

other_tests.findings: Polyclonal lymphoplasmacytic infiltrates, periductal fibrosis, and obliterative phlebitis.
Increased levels of total alkaline phosphatase.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Normalized alkaline phosphatase levels after zoledronic acid infusion in September 2013.
Markedly increased values for 25-(OH)D in July 2014, eventually returned to normal levels.
